moduware-header.copy: Debug information copied to your clipboard (to chinese)

disconnected.title: Slide left! (to chinese)
disconnected.message: Let's connect your Moduware device to your phone! To manage connections and devices use sidebar. (to chinese)

autoconnecting.title: Auto Connecting (to chinese)
autoconnecting.message: Connecting to your device. You can manage paired devices in settings. (to chinese)

connected.editInstructions: To switch between tiles tap on the module you want to change. (to chinese)

initializing.title: Initializing modules (to chinese)
initializing.message: It will take a few seconds to initialize all modules. (to chinese)

checking.title: Checking for updates (to chinese)
checking.message: It will take a few seconds to check for new updates. (to chinese)

noUpdates.title: No new updates available (to chinese)
noUpdates.message: You have latest version of software for current configuration (to chinese)

tiles.title: Available tiles (to chinese)
tiles.instruction: Select a tile you want to switch to. (to chinese)

autoConnecting.title: Auto Connecting (to chinese)
autoConnecting.message: Connecting to your device. You can manage paired devices in settings. (to chinese)

disconnected.title: Connect Modpack (to chinese)
disconnected.message: Find the device you want to connect to (to chinese)

scanning.title: Looking for Modpack (to chinese)
scanning.message: Make sure your bluetooth and Modpack are On (to chinese)

notFound.title: Device not found (to chinese)
notFound.message: Try again and make sure that your Modpack is On (to chinese)
